name: Coati Hoarder
description:
You are the ultimate trash hoarder! Step in the shoes of a cute latin american coati and steal as much trash as you can!

CONTROLS-------------

Arrows: Move
Space: Grab ball

--------------------------- Game made in 48 hs for the 2018 DaVinci GameJam. We will try to improve it!

Art Nicolas Ferreiro

Programming Manuel Schinoni

Game Design Marcos Biagi

Music Trostrigo
